root.name: Drake of the 99 Dragons
root.description: OverviewDrake of the 99 Dragons is a cel-shaded third-person shooter developed by Idol FX AB and published by Majesco on the Xbox and PC. The game was universally panned by critics for being poor in almost every aspect, from gameplay and camera control to numerous bugs. The Xbox version holds an average score of 22 on Metacritic based on sixteen critical reviews.In the game, the player takes on the role of Drake, a member of the 99 Dragons Clan hoping to take revenge after he is brought back to life following the slaughter of the 99 Dragons by a rival clan. Drake dual-wields firearms that the player can fire independently of one another.
